recipe.title: Mixed Greens with Bacon and Herbs
ingredients: 4 green onions, chopped (white and pale green parts only)
instructions: Cook bacon in heavy large skillet until crisp. Transfer to paper towels to drain.

Toss escarole, mixed greens, onions, basil, cilantro, and tarragon in large bowl. Add oil; toss. Add vinegar; toss. Season salad with salt and pepper. Divide among 6 plates. Sprinkle with bacon and serve.
